main event: A UFO sighting involving 24 objects observed over Grand Rapids, Michigan on 7 October 1958.
interesting points: The objects were described as the size of a dime, flying at high altitude in two formations of 12 objects each., The sighting lasted approximately 6 to 8 seconds., An astronomer suggested that the distribution of objects might correlate with a meteor shower occurring at that time., The objects were reported traveling in a southeast direction over the horizon., There were no photographs included in the report.
